children_at_the_property.text: Children of all ages are welcome.
Children 18 and above are considered adults at this property.
To see correct prices and occupancy info, add the number and ages of children in your group to your search.

cribs_and_extra_beds.text: Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
The maximum number of cribs, extra beds, and children allowed in existing beds can vary depending on the option booked.
All cribs and extra beds are subject to availability.

messages: Get the travel advice you need. Read more about possible travel restrictions before you go.
info_banners.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) update

categories.name: Safety features
facilities: Staff follow all safety protocols as directed by local authorities
Shared stationery (e.g. printed menus, magazines, pens, paper) removed
Hand sanitizer in guest accommodation and common areas
Process in place to check health of guests
Thermometers for guests provided by property
Screens or physical barriers between staff and guests in appropriate areas
categories.name: Physical distancing
Cleanliness & disinfection
facilities: Use of cleaning chemicals that are effective against coronavirus
Linens, towels, and laundry washed in accordance with local authority guidelines
Guests have the option to cancel any cleaning services for their accommodation during their stay

categories.name: Food & drink safety
facilities: All plates, cutlery, glasses, and other tableware sanitized

hotel_page.title: Sustainability initiatives
hotel_page.description: This property has taken steps to provide more sustainable and eco-friendly travel

sustainability_page.title: Sustainability initiatives

efforts.title: Waste
steps: Single-use shampoo, conditioner, and body wash bottles not used
The property makes efforts to reduce food waste

efforts.title: Water
steps: Option to opt out of daily room cleaning
Most food provided at the property is locally sourced
Most lighting throughout property uses energy-efficient LED bulbs
efforts.title: Energy and greenhouse gases

sustainability_page.description: These are the steps this property has taken to provide more sustainable and eco-friendly travel:

banner.title: Find a cancellation policy that works for you
banner.subtitle: Starting April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus. We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.

action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you don’t book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.
action_modal.title: Check your booking conditions

hotel_text.important_information: In accordance with government guidelines to minimize transmission of the coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary, and other relevant info on dates where such guidelines exist. Food and beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to the coronavirus (COVID-19). Due to the coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result. Due to the coronavirus (COVID-19), this property has reduced reception and service hours. Spa and gym facilities at this property are unavailable due to the coronavirus (COVID-19). Please inform Serene Beach Danang Hotel of your expected arrival time in advance. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly using the contact details in your confirmation. Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

policies.content: You can cancel for free until 3 days before arrival. You'll be charged the total price of the reservation if you cancel within 3 days of arrival. If you don't show up, the no-show fee will be the same as the cancellation fee.

Children of all ages are allowed. 1 child (up to and including 2 years old) stays for free when using available cribs.
1 child (up to and including 5 years old) stays for free when using existing beds.
1 child (from 6 years old  to 11 years old) stays for VND 200,000 per child per night when using existing beds.
1 child (from 12 years old  to 17 years old) stays for VND 350,000 per child per night when using existing beds.
 No extra beds are available. 
The maximum number of cribs is 1.
The maximum number of total guests is 4.
WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.
You'll be charged a prepayment of the total price of the reservation within 3 days of arrival.
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards before arrival.

items: A City tax is not applicable.
policies.content: 10 % VAT is included. 5 % Service charge is included. A City tax is not applicable.
